content: Hello, I have not been here for quite awhile now. I received this information today, You really need to go to this site and listen to what this person has to say. """This is a wake-up call if ever there was one...PT ""http://blip.tv/file/1382254/"" RICHARD D. DUFFY COLONEL, US ARMY (RET)""" I have sent the above Link to several Senators. On a different NOTE, I would like to invite you to join the DVG, you can check out the following Links: http://unitpages.military.com/unitpages/unit.do?id=854522 http://forums.military.com/eve/forums/a/tpc/f/828004719...m/2270036012001/p/20 May God richly bless and keep each of you. In His Service, Grover

title: JOIN THE DVG

content: Nemesis, Thank you. I am doing fine. Answering questions on Turbo Tax, repainting a house after my daughter, husband and 5 grandchildren lived in it for 5 1/2 years. I can only manage to get in about 3 hours a day and I am played out. Yes, I am staying out of trouble except spending too much time on the computer. My wife has given the computer a name. Thank you for joining the DVG. May God richly bless and keep you and your family. In His Service, Grover
